NanoCell83C2

Key Features

DimensionWxHxD(mm)

- Full View: 1,592 x 1,276 x 266
- Zero View: 1,592 x 450 x 266

*Availability of sizes and models may vary depending on region.

Infinite Contrast

The same content can look different depending on which display technology a TV has. LG OLED TVs have self-lit pixels that turn on and off to achieve perfect black and infinite contrast. LED and Mini LED TVs use backlights that are not self-emissive. This means they can't create perfect black and can also suffer from the halo effect. Self-lit pixels don't have this problem — there's no light bleed and no halo, so you get perfect black and better image quality.

*Screen images simulated.

100% Color
Fidelity

LG OLED TVs not only express perfect black, but also original color. Intertek, a global testing agency based in the UK, has certified that OLED displays have 100% color fidelity. This means on-screen colors closely match those of the original image. LED TVs simply can't match this standard of color reproduction.

100% Color
Volume

Thanks to LG TVs’ outstanding color reproduction technology, colors achieve full volume on LG OLED and QNED. Certified via independent third-party testing, the evolved display accurately captures a wider color gamut to deliver rich colors that remain brilliant even at maximum brightness levels. This ensures a vibrant experience and keeps everything you watch looking exactly as intended.

Eye Comfort
Display

If you worry about you and your family’s eyes, LG OLED TVs provide a more comfortable way to watch for longer. They’ve been certified as low-blue light, flicker-free, and discomfort glare-free displays by international agencies TÜV Rheinland (TUV) and Underwriter Laboratories (UL). LG OLED TVs are also the first panels from any kind of TV to receive the Eyesafe® certification developed by TUV-Eyesafe®.

*LG OLED TV sets, except LG OLED R, have been certified as low-blue light displays by TUV-Eyesafe®.
*LG OLED TV panels have been certified as flicker-free and discomfort glare free by UL.

REAL 8K
(7,680 x 4,320)

33 million self-lit pixels make LG OLED TV the only way to see real 8K. Each pixel can be controlled individually to display unprecedented levels of depth and detail with infinite contrast and perfect blacks. LG OLED TVs set the standard for real 8K — LED TVs that claim to be 8K just can’t quite reach this level of realism.

*LG OLED TV panels have been certified as flicker-free and discomfort glare free by UL.

AI Picture Pro

Developed using a vast database of over one million visual data points, the deep-learning algorithm recognizes content quality, while the 5th generation α9 AI processor removes noise, and optimizes contrast and saturation. The result is crisp, high-quality visuals.

*Screen images simulated.

Dynamic Tone
Mapping Pro

Dynamic Tone Mapping Pro analyzes the image and adjusts brightness levels to minimize saturated or smeared areas. When analyzing videos, it divides them into small blocks and collects data separately for each block. This way it can bring out individual areas of detail in a scene and optimize tone curves on a frame-by-frame basis.

AI Sound Pro

By learning from more than 17 million sound data points, the processor identifies voices, effects, and frequencies so it can optimize sound according to the audio genre. And the Auto Volume Leveling feature maintains consistent voice levels across different types of content. Also, with the a9 processor, LG Virtual Up-mixing now converts 2-channel audio into 7. 1. 2 channel audio providing a more spatial sound.

Google Assistant

Do more on your TV with help from Google. Access entertainment, get answers on screen, control smart devices, and more using your voice.

Amazon Alexa

Speak to Alexa through your LG TV to play music, check the weather, control smart home devices, and access more than 100,000 Skills and more. Make your life easier using Alexa routines to link several actions, such as traffic updates, weather reports, and alarms, with one voice command.

Apple Airplay

Effortlessly stream, share and mirror your favorite content from your iPhone, iPad or Mac. Play your favorites from the Apple TV app and other video apps, or view photos right on your LG ThinQ AI TV.

HomeKit

Use the Home app or Siri on your Apple devices to easily and securely control your ThinQ AI TV. You can turn your TV on and off, switch inputs, and even change the volume.

Dolby Vision IQ &
Dolby Atmos

LG TVs come with the latest solutions from Dolby. Dolby Vision IQ utilizes metadata and the TVs’ built-in light sensors to optimize picture quality based on content genre and ambient surroundings while Dolby Atmos simultaneously delivers multi- dimensional immersive sound. it’s a powerful combination that delivers a more realistic experience when watching a movie.

HDR 10 Pro

Because HDR 10 doesn't use dynamic metadata like Dolby, we integrated our own LG HDR technology that uses static metadata to create HDR 10 Pro. It uses that metadata to adjust color and brightness, reveal more detail in both bright and dark scenes, and enhance color to make everything you watch look more realistic. It also intensifies regular HDR content, so all your favorite movies and shows will be more dynamic and vibrant.

FILMMAKER
MODE

FILMMAKER MODE™ turns off motion smoothing, image sharpening, and other processing settings while preserving the original aspect ratios, colors, and frame rates. This accurately delivers the director's original intent, so you get to experience the film the way they intended.

NVIDIA G-SYNC

LG continue to work with industry- leader NVIDIA to make LG OLED TV the only G-SYNC compatible TV. LG OLED TVs use the precision and control of individual self-lit pixels to take full advantage of the G-SYNC compatibility, allowing fast response times and smoother gaming, even at high resolution.

*NVIDIA G-SYNC is compatible with RTX 20, RTX 30 and GTX 16 graphics cards. Older GPUs will not support G-SYNC compaibility.
*NVIDIA G-SYNC is only supported on Z1, G1, C1, and B1 models.

FreeSync™
Premium

We also partnered with AMD to bring FreeSync™ Premium to LG OLED TVs. Less flicker and low latency allow action-packed games to perform at their absolute peak with clear and fluid gameplay.

STADIA &
GEFORCE NOW

LG TV delivers the latest gaming experiences. Google Stadia and NVIDIA GEFORCE NOW are a real-time cloud gaming service that lets you instantly play an exciting array of games on your TV with just a controller and no additional gaming hardware.

Game Dashboard
& Optimizer

Game Optimizer provides optimized settings for various game genres including, FPS, RPG, RTS, and Sports. You can access everything in one place for greater control over picture and sound settings. And you can also toggle VRR, NVIDIA G-GYNC, and AMD FreeSync™ technologies. This added control ensures all your games will be clearer and smooth with less lag, stutter, and tearing.

*Items in Game Optimizer can be different by series.
*Dark Room mode only applies to 2022 OLED, QNED, NaoCell, and UHD TVs.

Composite Fiber

LG OLED TV is produced with composite fiber material making it lighter and eco-minded by emitting less carbon. Using the new material makes LG OLED TV more consumer friendly because it is easier to carry and install due to lightweight.

*Screen images simulated.

Eco Packaging

LG TVs are made to be more sustainable. LG's ultimate aim is to impact environmental change and improve the lives of it consumers. LG OLED uses recyclable box, 1 color printing and bio-based remote- control bag to minimize waste.

AI Picture Pro

Developed using a vast database of over one million visual data points, the deep-learning algorithm recognizes content quality, while the 5th generation α9 AI processor removes noise, and optimizes contrast and saturation. The result is crisp, high-quality visuals.

Dynamic Tone
Mapping Pro

When analyzing videos, it divides them into small blocks and collects data separately for each block. This way it can bring out individual areas of detail in a scene and optimize tone curves on a frame-by-frame basis.

AI Sound Pro

By learning from more than 17 million sound data points, the processor identifies voices, effects, and frequencies so it can optimize sound according to the audio genre. And the Auto Volume Leveling feature maintains consistent voice levels across different types of content. Also, with the a9 processor, LG Virtual Up-mixing now converts 2-channel audio into 7. 1. 2 channel audio providing a more spatial sound.

AI 8K Upscaling

α9 AI processor 8K uses a deep learning algorithm to transform 2K or 4K content into the most life-like 8K picture by enhancing detail and definition. You get to enjoy much clearer text and images with reduced noise and enhanced sharpness, even on LG's biggest screens.

LG OLED evo

LG OLED has evolved. The next-generation OLED panel, combined with the power of the Alpha 9 Gen 5 processor, sets a new standard for TV. The redesigned panel has an added layer of more emissive material that refines the wavelengths of light input. The materials used for OLED lighting have also been changed to enhance and strengthen light intensity. Also, OLED evo technology guarantees most advanced OLED picture quality and performance. LG’s new Heat dissipation technology improves maximum brightness making G2 the brightest LG OLED TV.

Gallery

LG OLED G2’s class-leading gallery design offers an ultra slim profile and built-in flush fit wall mount providing understated elegance to any space, merging seamlessly into your environment while making a bold statement and powerful focal point.

Narrow Bezel

LG OLED TVs use self-lit pixels instead of backlights. This allows for more innovative designs that are ultra-slim and have almost no bezels — it's a feat of engineering that has to be seen to be believed. The supper narrow bezel that focuses only on the screen enables people to have more immersive experience.

*This feature only applies to G2 and C2.
*Bezel size can be different by size.

Extreme Dimming
Technology 9X

LG QNED Mini LED features approximately 30,000 Mini LEDs to produce a bright, high-quality picture, while close to 2,400 unique dimming zones deliver stunning blacks with reduced halo effect even in the darkest scenes. The resulting image looks so good you might just think it's magic.

*2,400 dimming zones are number of block based on 86QNED99

100% Color
Volume

Thanks to LG TVs’ outstanding color reproduction technology, colors achieve full volume on LG OLED and QNED. Certified via independent third-party testing, the evolved display accurately captures a wider color gamut to deliver rich colors that remain brilliant even at maximum brightness levels. This ensures a vibrant experience and keeps everything you watch looking exactly as intended.

100% Color
Consistency

LG QNED and NanoCell TV display Pure Colors with high consistency from wide viewing angles thanks to Nano technology. Color consistency is a representation of display consistency in terms of color and lightness. Certified by Intertek, LG QNED and NanoCell TV deliver a high Color Consistency recorded as 100% by CIE DE2000 across 18 color patterns with a viewing angle of ±30°. In other words, this means that LG QNED and NanoCell TV display colors richly and accurately even when viewed from wide angles.

Ultra Contrast

Approximately 2,500 unique dimming zones deliver precise backlight control and an ultra-high contrast ratio. This makes blacks deeper and colors more vivid for a more detailed picture, even in the darkest scenes.

Full/Line/Zero View

The world’s first and only rollable TV has arrived. A truly unique design and unprecedented functionality make the LG SIGNATURE OLED R a sight to behold, whichever way you use it. Watch your favorite content in Full View mode, discreetly set the mood in Line View, or make the most of your space in Zero View.

Advanced Dimming
Technology

It’s time to experience more realistic and brighter image. Advanced dimming technology detects and maps object information to the backlight allowing for a more natural image with enhanced brightness.

*Based on internal measurement. Image Simulated.

NanoCell
Technology

LG NanoCell TV utilizes nanoparticles, our own distinctive Nano technology, to filter and refine color, removing impurities from RGB wavelengths. This means that only pure, accurate colors will be displayed on screen. The result is a more vibrant, more realistic picture that will bring your content to life.

100% Color
Consistency

LG QNED and NanoCell TV display Pure Colors with high consistency from wide viewing angles thanks to Nano technology. Color consistency is a representation of display consistency in terms of color and lightness. Certified by Intertek, LG QNED and NanoCell TV deliver a high Color Consistency recorded as 100% by CIE DE2000 across 18 color patterns with a viewing angle of ±30°. In other words, this means that LG QNED and NanoCell TV display colors richly and accurately even when viewed from wide angles.

AI Brightness
Control

A light sensor measures the surrounding ambient light, then the processor finely adjusts tone mapping for optimal screen brightness. HDR content is refined with brightness adjustments that transform darker scenes into ones with stunning contrast, detail, and color depth.

AI Sound Pro

By learning from more than 17 million sound data points, the processor identifies voices, effects, and frequencies so it can optimize sound according to the audio genre. And the Auto Volume Leveling feature maintains consistent voice levels across different types of content. Also, with the a7 and a5 processor, LG Virtual Up-mixing now converts
2-channel audio into 5. 1. 2 channel audio providing a more spatial sound.

Full/Line View

65ART90 provides various space value with differentiated UX. With Full View, people can enjoy the TV as gallery. Also, while not using it, just let it in Line View as a notification about music you are listening and time.

80W Sound

Selective Textile
Colors

The gorgeous TV covers are made in collaboration with renowned textile brand, Kvadrat. Kvadrat is well know for its application in high end audios such as B&O (Beoplay A9).

*Kvadrat is a premium textile brand in Denmark.

Rotate, Tilt,
Swivel

Watch in comfort wherever you are with StandbyME’s multiple adjustment options. With up to 180˚ rotation, 130 swivel, 50 tilt, and 20cm height adjustments, it’s easy to find your most comfortable viewing position.

*Vertical screen mode may not be supported in all apps.
*The product screen shows a simulated image which may differ from the actual product.

Wireless,
built-in Battery

No power outlet, no problem! A built-in battery lets you use StandbyME wirelessly, so you can place it wherever you need. The battery lasts for up to 3 hours on a single charge – that’s more than enough for a movie, a workout, or even an intense study session.

*The product screen shows a simulated image which may differ from the actual product.
*Built in battery supports up to 3 hours of wireless use. (3 hours based on using in standard mode but battery usage may vary depending on usage conditions)
*Ease of moving the product depends on the flooring material.

5-wheels

Five wheels hidden in the base of the product make it easy to move StandbyME around your home. Take it from your workspace to kitchen to living room, and back again without hassle.

NFC / Mirroring

StandbyME feature NFC allowing you to wirelessly mirror content from your phone, tablet, or laptop. Just tap your device against the NFC logo on the back of the screen to easily connect and enjoy more immersive mobile content with a bigger screen.

*The product screen shows a simulated image which may differ from the actual product.
*Depending on the specifications and manufacturer of the mobile device, the screen sharing (mirroring) method may differ as well as the image quality.
*NFC functionality works after ThinQ app is loaded onto mobile device and device is connected to the TV via Wi-Fi.
*Mobile screen sharing (mirroring) is available only on Android devices. (iOS is not supported)
*Connection condition may differ depending on user’s network environment.

Touch Screen

An intuitive touch screen display lets you operate StandbyME with ease. Just tap to open an app, pause a movie, change your display settings, and more!

*The product screen shows a simulated image which may differ from the actual product.
*Touch screen functionality varies by app and may not be supported for all apps.
*Apps that cannot be operated by touch can be controlled by using the provided remote control.

Remote
Controller

A handy remote lets you stay in control even when the touch screen display is out of reach. Whether you want to switch channels without getting up or get comfortable before starting a movie, the remote is your new best friend.

Swivel Stand

The OLED G2 comes with a swivel stand allowing people to see more action. The stand swivels 10˚ left and right each which provides the comfortable viewing position.

* G series stand is optional

Interior
